AutoCategorizeRules.Title: When beneficiary name contains 'chevron' or 'shell' categorize transaction as 4 (Auto & Transport / Gas & Fuel)
When mcc is 5811 (Caterers) categorize transaction as 39 (Food & Dining / Restaurants)
When mcc is 5499 (FOOD STORES) or BeneficiaraName contains LIDL categorize transaction as 38 (Groceries)
When BeneficiaraName contains A1 Telecom categorize transaction as 11 (Mobile Phone)
When BeneficiaraName contains Asseco categorize transaction as 15 (Utilities)
